data.title: Company Overview & News
data.meta_description: Founded in 1887 by William Randolph Hearst, the Hearst Corporation has interests in magazines, newspapers, and business publishing, as well as newspaper
data.text:
New Cayman Islands Cricket Tournament Could Ignite T10 Format Aimed To Rival Soccer

A new cricket tournament in the Cayman Islands might prove a boost for the shorter T10 format that has been devised to rival soccer's 90-minute playing time.

NYT ‘Strands’ Hints, Spangram And Answers For Sunday, August 18th

Looking for help with today's NYT Strands puzzle? Here's an extra hint to help you uncover the right words, as well as all of today's answers and Spangram.

NASCAR Returns Home: 2025 Clash To Ignite Bowman-Gray Stadium

The Madhouse just got madder. NASCAR's 2025 Clash will be held at Bowman-Gray Stadium, bringing the Cup Series back to its roots and into the heart of motorsport history.

UFC 305 Results: Fighter Goes Viral With ‘Outrageous’ Head Knot

Most people in the MMA community called it a knot or a bump. The correct term is hematoma. Whatever you call it, Ricky Glenn had a serious one on Saturday at UFC 305.

Chiefs Rookie Kingsley Suamataia Plays Well In Loss To His Cousin’s Lions

Left tackle Kingsley Suamataia played the first four drives of the Kansas City Chiefs' second preseason game.

Today’s ‘Wordle’ #1156 Hints, Clues And Answer For Sunday, August 18th

Looking for help with today's New York Times Wordle? Here are hints, clues and commentary to help you solve today's Wordle and sharpen your guessing game.

Out In The Open And On The Move In Russia’s Kursk Oblast, Ukrainian Forces Are Vulnerable—And Losing Lots Of Armored Vehicles

But heavy losses might be worth it, if Ukraine can seize and hold a big portion of Kursk.

Musk Says X Will Close Brazil Operations—What To Know About The Dispute

Musk has taken digs at the judge online since April, when X said it was forced to block particular popular accounts in Brazil.

Drake Placed A Huge Wager On The UFC 305 Main Event

Drake has been known to place large bets on sporting events, and the UFC is often the subject of his biggest wagers. Drake is back at it, and he’s betting on UFC 305.

UFC 305 Results: Winners And Losers From Du Plessis Vs. Adesanya Card

UFC 305 Results: Everything you need to know about tonight's Dricus du Plessis vs. Israel Adesanya fight card - full fight card results, winners, losers, bonus winners.

OKC Thunder Could Be Most Dominant Defensive Team Next Season

Following the acquisitions of Alex Caruso and Isaiah Hartenstein, the OKC Thunder should be among the best defensive teams in the league next season.

Perry Kurtz, Comedian And ‘America’s Got Talent’ Alum, Dies In Los Angeles Hit-And-Run

Comedian Perry Kurtz ("America's Got Talent") was killed in a hit-and-run accident in Los Angeles on Thursday.

FC Barcelona Star Gundogan Hands In Shock Transfer Request And Asks To Leave Club, Reports SPORT

FC Barcelona midfielder Ilkay Gundogan has asked to leave the club in the current transfer window according to the Catalan media.

‘Alien: Romulus’ Heading Toward $40 Million-Plus Opening Weekend

“Alien Romulus” is looking to take the box office crown from “Deadpool & Wolverine” with more than $40 million in its domestic debut.

Meet America’s Best Employers For Women 2024

The 600 companies on this year's list champion gender pay equity, workplace flexibility and female leadership.
